name: mindmaps
description: Management tool for node-based maps and interactive diagrams

scripts.stop: pkill -f 'cargo run' && pkill -f 'npm run backend:rust' && pkill -f 'concurrently' && sleep 1 && lsof -ti:1337 | xargs -r kill -9
scripts.backend:rust: cd backend-rust && DATABASE_URL=sqlite:./db.sqlite SECRET_KEY=mindmaps_secret_key cargo run
scripts.backend:python: cd backend && export FLASK_DEBUG=1 && python app.py
scripts.backend:rust:release: cd backend-rust && DATABASE_URL=sqlite:./db.sqlite SECRET_KEY=mindmaps_secret_key cargo run --release
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app && npm install
scripts.clean: cd app && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ..image.png && cargo clean
scripts.tauri:dev: cd src-tauri && DATABASE_URL=sqlite:./db.sqlite SECRET_KEY=mindmaps_secret_key cargo tauri dev
